name: Leah Gladen
description: Leah Gladen is aNetrunnerwho stumbled upon theCorpCracker, a device capable of jailbreakingcorporatecyberware. She tries to pawn it over to bothWakako Okadaand theTyger Clawssimultaneously, ultimately deciding to take up the Tyger Claws' offer. She is double crossed by theTyger Clawsand killed in their hideout at theWired Head. WhenVfinds her body at the toilets of the braindance club,Johnny Silverhandwill remark that Gladen deserves aDarwin Awardfor her poor decision-making.
